content: connect each round with single_crochet and crochet in continuous rounds r 1 ml single_crochet 6 into the ml 6 r 35 we will stitch the strap to the bag this round by placing the strap on r 2 27 top row of the bag see photos on r 5 single_crochet 27 27 page 8 still using the yarn and hook from the previous rounds r 6 single_crochet 2 st increase x9 36 single_crochet 8 st through both stitches of the r 7 single_crochet 36 36 strap and bag single_crochet 32 st bag r 8 single_crochet 3 st increase x9 45 placing the other end of the strap on the outside of the bag in the same r 9 single_crochet 45 45 way r 10 single_crochet 4 st increase x9 54 single_crochet 8 st through both stitches of the r 11 single_crochet 54 54 strap and bag single_crochet 33 st bag 81 r 12 single_crochet 5 st increase x9 63 continue with crocheting the bag and r 13 single_crochet 63 63 ignore the strap and top from here r 14 single_crochet 6 st increase x9 72 r 36 r 39 single_crochet 81
